channel.title: People needed for new server
channel.description:
I need a few people to help me make a new server.
Positions:: Server Coder: 1. Forum setup: 1. ~Taken~
Requirements: Coder must be able to code skills, weapon hit-rates, etc. because i will be adding many new items to the game. Coder will get admin status as long as he is non-abusive of his power!!
[s]Forum people must be able to make a forum with a good looking skin and be able to do everything needed to keep the forum in check. [/s]
~Application~ Server name: Position wanted: Reason I should pick you: Reason you want the position: Past experiences: MSN name: (i will need an example of work later on)

item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Server name:Don’t got one
Position wanted: forum setup
Reason I should pick you: I am very good with SMF forums (what these forums use), I have alot of web development experience, ive been bored out of my mind with nothing to do lately
Reason you want the position: Bored out of my mind… Best for the job
Past experiences: I currently run my own paid domain
MSN name: ill PM it to you if you accept me (but my msn hasn’t been working right lately)
(i will need an example of work later on)
